You need to firstly change “Chop Down” to “ChopDown”
and
Make a Var called "ChopDown : Integer; "

item.title: Problems
item.dc:creator: @teh_spede Teh Spede
item.description:
@teh_spede wrote:

ok
[br][size=1]Posted at: May 16, 2006, 08:56:13 pm[/size][hr]Again i have probs: [code]program Autowcer;
var logscut,x,y,mine:integer;

const
tree1color=0;

procedure starttochop;
begin
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,tree1Color,5,5,514 ,337,5))then
movemousesmooth (x,y)
wait(1000+random(2500))
if(FindBitmapToleranceIn(mine,x,y,6,6,126,23,1))then
begin
getmousepos (x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(3000+Random(1000))
logscut:=logscut+1;
end;
end;

procedure loadbitmaps;
begin
Chop Down := BitmapFromString(72, 15, ‘z78DAED98D19283200C4’ +
‘57F0954D43E76A7F8FF9FD490D069DC9028751FCA0E30C3EC2820’ +
‘DCC30DE93AF72E7189731C721BE21407A7147A6BF769A5C41176E’ +
‘2612753F4CDACF906944622959F407D6CD416FAFFC088F9B1A5DA’ +
‘3CAF19CF9E6B632FDC5315A3909746B3395E01CE6A2BBCC8593E6’ +
‘95F356A855DFE0F5E18091BE355A93CE795DBD3371AF409A0CF82’ +
‘7188B587AA8E78CBBC5B9CE71223D6626C578F2CC6CB28DB5DA79’ +
‘B5BDC926629BEA579EEA8765A7FE12B34566B19AF6AA7F078083B’ +
‘F6AFAFD3DFEAAD477484CEA495A69846C71E75705A30C7E0F3A86’ +
‘B56E8A08EB9CAFE5CE1E2DBE29A331D3173E4F5335E771C27A228’ +
‘CE35A87B47E5E56AB5E75CE1DA514A240992BB9D6F64856D2EAB0’ +
‘B3AAF9D3BD05FEA4E57AC4EA89AA2D644D91D9DF9DA4CEF45F9F7’ +
‘A803E5355E44FF4F2917DD1D4A5CB2EB6D5EDB595ED223BB27142’ +
‘D5D395BE05CECE7327BB7F34696CFD738859491AE343DAEF2527C’ +
‘7710096BCF98CD8B7C3738EFFCF998A6B9E33C2F16C973A53CC4F’ +
‘E15F09986B4DE7C428820F2B27DC16FAB7CA3A12B6B338DC23C27’ +
‘D62C3D92091229C68BD351BEBEA5AD43BDCCEB6B7F211A77622F5’ +
‘FC7CBBCDD7AE9BC7AB9FC1FB3A9F3EAA5C5F20493701404’);
end;
begin
loadbitmaps;
repeat
starttochop;
Writeln('Chopped '+inttostr(logscut)+ ‘logs so far’)
until(false)
end.[/code] And the prob is: Line 23: [Error] (23:1): Unknown identifier ‘Chop’ in script.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems
item.dc:creator: @teh_spede Teh Spede
item.description:
@teh_spede wrote:

[code]program Autominer;
var rocksmined,x,y,mine:integer;

const
rock1color=0;

procedure starttomine;
begin
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,Rock1Color,5,5,514 ,337,5))then
movemousesmooth (x,y)
wait(1000+random(2500))
if(FindBitmapToleranceIn(mine,x,y,6,6,126,23,1))then
begin
getmousepos (x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(3000+Random(1000))
rocksmined:=rocksmined+1;
end;
end;

procedure loadbitmaps;
begin
Mine := BitmapFromString(17, 17, ‘z78DADD94DB0A80200C407F69’ +
‘B38BFAA8ADFFFFA5861B44880F6952B60303D9F4A0E000AA22828’ +
‘74573EF18C4B2DB7D65522EF590671C6D1429B458783F831E2DDA’ +
‘A225810601428B45B8545DAA76B00872BE5ADC09CC8C69B1E8FB6’ +
‘4F7D2D5A396628F5826E62F16C3E0F016E9A9B2DC0EB16433A7EE’ +
‘1FBD3CA53F603900F40458C2’);
end;
begin
loadbitmaps;
repeat
starttomine;
WriteIn('Mined '+inttostr(rocksmined)+ ‘rocks so far’)
until(false)
end.[/code]This Should mine 28 ores, but there is a problem: Line 34: [Error] (34:1): Unknown identifier ‘WriteIn’ in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\Scripts\My test.scar

Read full topic
